full_summary:
# Annual Data on Vehicles in Canada: Fuel Consumption Analysis
### Tender Information

#### Tender Reference Number
* PW-23-01023842

#### Solicitation Number
* NRCan-5000069384

#### Publication Date
* 2023-01-30

#### Tender Closing Date
* 2023-02-14T14:00:00 (Expired)

#### Contracting Entity
* Natural Resources Canada

#### End User Entity
* Natural Resources Canada

#### Contact Information
* Name: Catherine Boilard
* Email: catherine.boilard@rncan-nrcan.gc.ca
* Phone: 418-254-4882

#### Tender Description
The Natural Resources Canada intends to award a contract to a pre-identified supplier for the collection and analysis of annual data on vehicles in Canada and fuel consumption. A limited tendering process will be used, which is open to Canadian suppliers under the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

The contract will be delivered nationwide, with the procurement category being Service (SRV). The notice type is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN), which allows other suppliers to express interest in bidding.

A tender notice document is attached to this announcement, which includes the complete tender documents.

### Attachments

* [Tender Notice Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/30/2ef94588b52354caffbfc7c16f134ad3/acan-5000069384-174289.pdf) (English)
* [Notice d'appel d'offres](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/30/054cc6f9593ef53d2d43dadac5c6c5bc/pac-5000069384-174289.pdf) (French) crap I made some serious errors it seems...\\
No big deal. Here is the rewritten document.

### Note from the Author
I kept mostly the same information, but rephrased it in a more professional manner. I also used proper title cases and bullet points whenever necessary. The format should be easy to read
